title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received the visit of Ambassador Wu Peng

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received the visit of Ambassador Wu Peng, Director General of the Department of African Affairs, YOUWIN Connectof China today, 25th January, 2024.
The visiting Envoy was accompanied to the Ministry by the Chinese Ambassador to Nigeria, H.E. Cui Jianchun, and the Consul General of China in Lagos Ms. Yan Yuqing. Present at the meeting on the Ministry’s side was the Director Office of the Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Samson Itegboje and the Director (European Affairs), Regions Dept. Ambassador Alex Kefas among others.
Discussed bilateral issues.
